org.braincopy

クラス Information

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.braincopy.Information
  • すべての実装されたインタフェース:
    Comparable<Information>

    public class Information
extends Object
implements Comparable<Information>
    is a class to abstract any information in the world.
    作成者:
    Hiroaki Tateshita

    • フィールドのサマリー

      フィールド 
      修飾子とタイプ フィールドと説明
      protected String description
      is supposed to be the overview of this information
      protected List<File> fileList
      is a collection of files attached to this information, including picture files.
      protected String id
      is a field to identify this information object. it is usually same with name
      protected Location location
      is supposed to be a location strongly related to this information
      protected String name
      is a name to identify this information object. it is usually same with id
      protected Picture picture
      非推奨です。 
      replaced by fileList

    • コンストラクタのサマリー

      コンストラクタ 
      コンストラクタと説明
      Information(String _name)
      constructs this object with its name
      Information(String _name, Location _location)
      constructs this object with its name and location

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド concreteメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      int compareTo(Information o)
      compare with this id
      Location getLocation()
      returns the location object owned by this Information object.
      String getName()
      returns the name of this object.
      Picture getPicture()
      provide a picture object owned by this Information object.
      void setPicture(Picture _picture)
      adds an object of Picture class.
      String toString()
      returns the name of this object.

      • クラスから継承されたメソッド java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • フィールドの詳細

      • id

        protected String id
        is a field to identify this information object. it is usually same with name

      • name

        protected String name
        is a name to identify this information object. it is usually same with id

      • description

        protected String description
        is supposed to be the overview of this information

      • location

        protected Location location
        is supposed to be a location strongly related to this information

      • fileList

        protected List<File> fileList
        is a collection of files attached to this information, including picture files.

      • picture

        protected Picture picture
        非推奨です。 replaced by fileList
        is a file of picture. in the future, this field will be deleted.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • Information

        public Information(String _name,
                   Location _location)
        constructs this object with its name and location
        パラメータ:
        _name - not null
        _location -

      • Information

        public Information(String _name)
        constructs this object with its name
        パラメータ:
        _name - not null

    • メソッドの詳細

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Information o)
        compare with this id
        定義:
        compareTo インタフェース内 Comparable<Information>

      • getName

        public String getName()
        returns the name of this object.
        戻り値:
        name not null

      • toString

        public String toString()
        returns the name of this object.
        オーバーライド:
        toString クラス内 Object

      • getLocation

        public Location getLocation()
        returns the location object owned by this Information object.
        戻り値:
        location. returns null if this Information object does not have location.

      • getPicture

        public Picture getPicture()
        provide a picture object owned by this Information object. If this Information object does not have any Picture object, this method will return null. If this Information object has more than two Picture objects, this method returns the first added Picture object.
        戻り値:
        picture object. returns null if this Information object does not have a Picture object

      • setPicture

        public void setPicture(Picture _picture)
        adds an object of Picture class.
        パラメータ:
        _picture - not null
